name: nxc.vim
summary: Syntax highlighter for NXC language on Lego NXT System
install_details:
1.  Make a directory ~/.vim/syntax. "~" Refers to your home directory.
   2. Copy nxc.vim from where you downloaded it to into this directory.
   3. Make sure you have ":set syntax" in your .vimrc file.
   4. Start up Vim and type ":set syntax=nxc".
   5. Your syntax coloring will now be set for the NXC language for this buffer.
